## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Thomas Wilson, III v. State
**판결일**: 2018-11-29
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

AFFIRM; and Opinion Filed November 29, 2018.




                                             In The
                                Court of Appeals
                         Fifth District of Texas at Dallas
                                      No. 05-17-01003-CR

                              THOMAS WILSON, III, Appellant
                                          V.
                              THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee

                      On Appeal from the 204th Judicial District Court
                                   Dallas County, Texas
                           Trial Court Cause No. F-15-75982-Q

                             MEMORANDUM OPINION
                          Before Justices Lang, Fillmore, and Schenck
                                  Opinion by Justice Schenck
       Appellant Thomas Wilson, III pleaded guilty to the offense of murder and a jury assessed

his punishment at 70 years’ confinement. In a single issue, appellant contends he received

ineffective assistance of counsel because trial counsel did not obtain a ruling on her objection to

certain statements the prosecutor made during closing argument, thus failing to preserve an issue

for appellate review. We overrule appellant’s issue and affirm his conviction. Because all issues

are settled in law, we issue this memorandum opinion. TEX. R. APP. P. 47.4.
